save-our-selves.config.title: Unofficial Monumenta Mod Configuration
save-our-selves.config.option.selfLowHea: At what percent of your max health are you considered low
Beep as long as your health is low
How loud you want your heartbeat
save-our-selves.config.option.selfAlarmH: If not 0, you'll hear a heartbeat at this BPM

The heartbeat BPM you'll hear when dead,
with all health values in between scaled accordingly.
Ignored if low health heartbeat BPM is 0
save-our-selves.config.option.playerLowH: At what percent of your max health are players considered low
Beep as long as players' health is low
How loud you want other players' heartbeats
save-our-selves.config.option.playerAlar: If not 0, you'll hear a heartbeat at this BPM

The heartbeat BPM you'll hear when dead,
with all health values in between scaled accordingly.
Ignored if low health heartbeat BPM is 0
